alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chemung and southeastern Steuben Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Addison, or 10 miles southwest of Corning, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corning, Big Flats, Caton, Lindley, Painted Post, Addison, South Corning, Lawrenceville, East Corning and Gang Mills. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 44 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
